hero.brief-description-detail: focused on creating solutions with quality and elegance.

about.description: I am a dedicated Full Stack Developer with 4 years of experience, specializing in both front-end and back-end development. Proficient in technologies like React, TypeScript, NextJS, NestJS, MongoDB, SOLID, and Clean Architecture, I prioritize delivering high-quality products. My commitment to detail, rigorous testing, and adherence to industry best practices reflects my focus on quality. With a degree in Analysis and Development of Systems, I bring a solid theoretical foundation to my practical experience. Eager to contribute to innovative projects and collaborate with dynamic teams, I am well-equipped to navigate the challenges of the ever-evolving tech landscape.

projects.description: These projects demonstrate my expertise with practical examples of some of my work, including brief descriptions and links to code repositories and live demos. They showcase my ability to tackle intricate challenges, adapt to various technologies, and efficiently oversee projects.

projects-description.p3: This is a portfolio template where I use 3D objetcs.
projects-description.p4: A complete barber shop app for mobile devices.
projects-description.p5: This is a barber shop website where customers can schedule an appointment in a barber shop.
projects-description.p6: In this project you can save a new one using only your voice.
projects-description.p7: This project is a simple Next.js application that uses the Google OAuth API to authenticate users and Prisma as the ORM to interact with a PostgreSQL database.
projects-description.p8: A Front-end application for a barber shop that allows customers to schedule appointments.
projects-description.p9: An application with fron-end + back-end reponsable for signing up users and loging in users + reset password send emails.
